short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension lets you login as another user to your SharePoint 2013/2016/Online Site with a button click.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension provides you a quick way to login as another user to your SharePoint 2013/2016/Online Site. The Login as another user option is removed after SharePoint 2010 version.
